features: DESIGNED TO PREVENT PUBIC IRRITATION – Our pubic disposable razor offers 3 skin protection blades with unique skin guards to prevent razor bumps and ingrown hairs, ensuring a smooth and comfortable close shave.
ULTRA-GLIDE SERUM FOR ADVANCED LUBRICATION – Give your skin the comfort it needs with ultra-glide serum + aloe for advanced lubricating protection.
SLIM CARTRIDGE IDEAL FOR PUBIC AREA – Easy to use and designed with a slim, pivoting cartridge, it flexes around your curves to get those hard-to-reach areas for pubic hair removal.
DERMATOLOGIST TESTED – A hypoallergenic formula that’s dermatologist and gynecologist tested.
GET EXPERT-LEVEL PRECISION AND CONTROL – The curved, textured handle is designed for secure grip.
RECYCLABLE RAZOR – Remember to recycle your used razors through our recycling program: edgewellrecycling.com.
body.description: Designed to prevent pubic irritation and ingrown hairs, Hydro Silk Ultimate Pubic Skin Protection Disposable Razor offers 3 skin protection blades with unique skin guards plus a slim pivoting cartridge that flexes around your curves to reach tricky areas. Dermatologist and gynecologist tested, this pubic hair razor is designed with a curved, textured handle for a secure grip. Get expert-level precision and control and give your skin the comfort it needs with ultra-glide serum + aloe for advanced lubricating protection. Designed with a hypoallergenic formula, this women’s razor is ideal for bikini and pubic hair removal. When it comes to travel razors for women, the disposable Schick bikini razor is a perfect go-to for on-the-go smoothness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wasn't expecting a great shave as this is only 3 blades and I usually use a 5 blade shaver. Well I am impressed. It gave me a very clean shave and no nicks! It seems like the head is more flexible and followed the contours of my skin better than my usually shaver. It glides over skin smoothly and even shaving my knees was no issue as it just adapted to the bony surface and did it's job. The best part though, no redness, no irritation, no rash on my bikini area! Even the next day skin still looked great with none of those bumps, pimples, whatever you want to call them. Will be replacing my current shaver with this as one it is better priced and two it actually did a better job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, But Not Great
reviews.reviewText: I got this disposable razors hoping they would provide a closer and more comfortable shave for my sensitive skin. While they did deliver on the comfort aspect, I found that they didn't quite live up to my expectations in terms of closeness. Don't get me wrong, they're still a good option for those looking for a gentle razor, but if you're expecting a super smooth finish, you might want to look elsewhere. Another thing to note is that the blades can become dull fairly quickly, so you may need to replace them more often than you'd like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are excellent razors. I'm very happy with hie well they work. The handle is comfortable to hold and easy to maneuver on my skin. It gets my legs smooth without any cuts or nicks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My favorite thing about these razors is the handle design as it's easy to maneuver and not add too much pressure in sensitive areas.My least favorite thing is they are only a 3 blade count instead of 5. So it seems I have to go over some areas more than once. Due to this, the razors won't stay sharp as long and I will likely only get 2 shaves at best out of 1.Overall, my impression is positive since these did not leave any irritation after using.I did not accidentally nick myself either and it was easy to get into tricky areas.I just wish these shaved a little more hair in one stroke as I had to swipe the same area a few times instead of a one stroke shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great handle and maneuverability - not the closest shave.
reviews.reviewText: While I love the handle design on this and it made it easier to reach hard to reach areas - it definitely did not give me a super close shave. I should feel stubble immediately after a second and third pass with the razor and that is with using a gel-based non-irritant/no razor bumps cream.I found I get a much closer shave with a Mach 3 and the no-bumps cream even though its less "ergonomic" than this razor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: nice size for using in delicate areas. i swear the older i get the more south all that mess grows. lol. gotta tackle half my upper thigh now it seems. but these razors help tame the mane and keep the garden in order. nicely trimmed bushes make the flowers look better, lolol. the razor works, no razor burn or ingrown hairies. i dont use this for my legs though. too small. good for pits, upper lip if you are cursed with that problem, and the hoo. 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I prefer the Venus pubic razors better but these do well enough for disposables. The maneuverability is their biggest strong point. I do feel like I have to go over a spot more than other brands, but I suppose that's a 3 blade vs 5 blade issue. Overall, not bad, but I don't think I'll get them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These razors are just terrible. Even worse than the big pack of solid light pink ones you can get at the grocery store. Don't work well, cut up my legs, are almost falling apart.
